Salsile Project Brief

Salsile Inc. is a well-established fashion retailer specializing in

high quality clothing and accessories for men and women.the

client is looking to revamp their existing e-commerce website to

enhance user experience,improve overall aesthetics and increase

online sales. The new design should reflect their brand identity as

a modern, and customer-centric fashion store.
